## link_to_if(condition, text, url[, html_options])
Links to a url if a condition is true
options
	callback 	this callback (if provided) is called is the (text, url) if the condition is false
				otherwise the text shows without a link

	link_to_if(false,"Reply","/reply")
	 
	 => 
	 
	Reply


	link_to_if(true,"Reply","/reply")

	=>

	<a href='/reply' >Reply</a>
